meanings.definition: An organism that can only tolerate a narrow range of temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The stenotherm fish can only survive in a small range of temperatures.
meanings.sent2: The stenotherm frog is very picky about the temperature of its habitat.
meanings.sent3: The stenotherm penguin refuses to swim in waters that are too warm.
meanings.sent4: The stenotherm lizard is like a delicate thermometer, reacting quickly to any temperature changes.
meanings.sent5: The stenotherm plant wilts immediately if exposed to temperatures outside its comfort zone.

meanings.definition: A species that is highly sensitive to changes in temperature.
meanings.sent1: The stenotherm bird is easily affected by even slight temperature fluctuations.
meanings.sent2: The stenotherm butterfly struggles to adapt to sudden temperature changes.
meanings.sent3: The stenotherm squirrel shivers at the slightest drop in temperature.
meanings.sent4: The stenotherm flower blooms beautifully only in a very specific temperature range.
meanings.sent5: The stenotherm insect buzzes around happily in its preferred temperature environment.
